messages.title: Only UKIP offers REAL CHANGE
messages.content: for the people of the Llanelli Constituency, Wales and the United Kingdom.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Llanelli Town Centre needs urgent attention, encouraging people to come into the Town Centre, more people equals more trade.

A dedicated 'Shuttle Bus Service' and 'Park and Ride' to link the out of town shopping centres of Trostre and Pemberton Parks will integrate both and is vital to bring more trade into the Town Centre.
Ensure fair business rates are applied for the Town Centre shops.
Maintain and continue to improve vital services at Prince Phillip Hospital.

Actively involved with Llanelli and District Shop Mobility to ensure that the less mobile people within our community have access to the Town Centre, Leisure facilities and the Millenium Coastal Park.
Preserve our recreational facilities including Park Howard.
A better future and job prospects for our children and grandchildren.

issues.health: Maintain and continue to improve vital services at Prince Phillip Hospital.

leaflet.personalStatement: My promise to the people of the Llanelli Constituency is that I will continue to work for you, as always.

images.caption: Kenneth Denver Rees holding UKIP pamphlets
